title: T-Cards For Sale: T206, T205, T200, T202, T207
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: T-Cards For Sale: T206, T205, T200, T202, T207
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have quite a few T-cards for sale. The prices and scans can be found on the following link:

[url]http://www.cyscards.com[/url]

Shipping/insurance will be added to the prices, but just what is necessary. I prefer to be paid with a US Postal money order or check. But I will accept PayPal as well.

You can contact me at: [url]cy@cyscards.com[/url].

Thank you.

Cy
